name: EDITED_SIG_WARNING_ACK
description: Contains the overrides for the warning about this order being copied from another order with an edited sig.

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the patient order template record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EDITED_SIG_WARNING_ACK_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who acknowledged the source order edited sig.

columns.name: EDITED_SIG_WARNING_ACK_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EDITED_SIG_WARN_ACK_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the source order edited sig was acknowledged.
